error.title: VDB input node
error.description:
## Invalid VDB input node
Validate that the node connected to the output node is of type VDB.
Regardless of the amount of VDBs created the output will need to have an equal amount of VDBs, points, primitives and vertices
A VDB is an inherited type of Prim, holds the following data: - Primitives: 1 - Points: 1 - Vertices: 1 - VDBs: 1
